title: Welfare safety net program; department of human
context: [ยง346-69] Welfare safety net program; department of human services. The department of human services may create a welfare safety net program entitled &ldquo;Keeping Hope Alive&rdquo; to assist working families that will be disqualified from receiving further public assistance as a consequence of reaching the five-year time limit set by the federal Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity [Reconciliation] Act of 1996. [L 2001, c 150, ยง4]
